i=0
while i<=16:
    print(2**i)
    i+=1

row=1
while row<=10:
    col=1
    while col<=10:
        print(row, '*', col, '=', row*col)
        col+=1
    row+=1

row=1
while row<=10:
    col=1
    while col<=10:
        print(row*col, end="\t")
        col+=1
    print()
    row+=1

for row in range(1, 11):
    for col in range(1,11):
        print(row*col, end="\t")
    print()
